title: Idaho DJC Youth Pay to Stay Policy

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Idaho Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The following materials regarding the imposition, assessment, collection and balances of fees and debt for incarcerated youth (i.e., juvenile):

a) All current policies and procedures regarding medical and room & board costs or fees for which incarcerated youth (i.e. juvenile) and/or their parents or legal guardians are or may become liable. Please include all policies and procedures related to how fees are set, accrued, imposed, collected, and enforced (such as those related to per diem fees, ability to pay determinations, penalties for late or non-payment, authorization for civil or criminal action for payment enforcement, etc). 

b) All reports, databases, spreadsheets, or equivalent materials regarding debts/restitution paid to or owed to this department/office or any facility/agency under its jurisdiction in FY2021. Please include all relevant data regarding medical and room & board costs, including the number of youths (i.e., juveniles) charged for medical and room & board costs or fees and the total amount of medical and room & board fees imposed in FY2021.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mercy Loyo

title: Facebook Law Enforcement Online Request portal accessees in public health (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. The list of all employees and their rank/job title within your agency who have been granted access to the Facebook Content Request System (https://www.facebook.com/xtakedowns/login).
2. Your agency's internal procedures, if any, in determining who would exercise access to the Facebook Content Request System (https://www.facebook.com/xtakedowns/login) on your agency's behalf.
3. Your agency's procedures, guidelines and policies in determining when the Facebook Content Request System (https://www.facebook.com/xtakedowns/login) would be used, and who would be permitted to authorise its use.
4. Documented actions by your agency in the use of the Facebook Content Request System (https://www.facebook.com/xtakedowns/login).
5. All e-mails received by any employee of your agency that contain the keyword "content request" (not case sensitive) and originate from the facebook.com domain.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris von Csefalvay

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: ILINet
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. The software architecture of ILINet.
2. The complete list of institutions with access to ILINet, including the number of access credentials issued to individuals within the institution.
3. The complete source code of ILINet.
4. Any internal user's manuals, maintenance manuals and documentation about ILINet.
5. A list of any and all APIs and other interfaces that allow programmatic access to ILINet data.
6. A list of any and all approved users or system credentials for APIs listed in (5), if any.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris von Csefalvay
